userProperties.name: Operation
userProperties.value: Deleting text files from Data lake Storage

content.query:
Use TrainingDB
GO
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Hello@123'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL democredential
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-06-02T11:53:24Z&st=2023-06-02T03:53:24Z&spr=https&sig=2XgbvPtREEYFFr4OrInfPjWCHIYkatCwfWGxMSBZA2E%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE demodatasource WITH(
LOCATION = 'https://synapsesadlsgen2.blob.core.windows.net',
CREDENTIAL = democredential
);

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFileFormat
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)

CREATE SCHEMA NYCTaxi

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE NYCTaxi.PassengerCountStats
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'synapsedemo/NYCTaxi/',
        DATA_SOURCE = demodatasource,
        FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
    )
AS
SELECT PassengerCount,
      SUM(AvgTripDistance) as SumTripDistance,
      AVG(AvgTripDistance) as AvgTripDistance
FROM 
OPENROWSET
(
    BULK 'https://synapsesadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsetraining/NYCTaxi/parquetfile/part-00000-f5720c7d-066d-4f69-aabb-46cf1da30620-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
)AS [result]

WHERE AvgTripDistance > 0 AND PassengerCount > 0
GROUP BY PassengerCount
GO

select * from NYCTaxi.PassengerCountStats

Use SynapseTrainingDB
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Hello@123!$%'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL trainingcredential
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE trainingdatasource WITH(
LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsetraining@synapsesadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net',
CREDENTIAL = trainingcredential,
TYPE = HADOOP
);

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetTrainingFileFormat
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.NYCTaxi
( 
	[DateID] [int]  NULL,
	[MedallionID] [int]  NULL,
	[HackneyLicenseID] [int]  NULL,
	[PickupTimeID] [int]  NULL,
	[DropoffTimeID] [int]  NULL,
	[PickupGeographyID] [int]  NULL,
	[DropoffGeographyID] [int]  NULL,
	[PickupLatitude] [float]  NULL,
	[PickupLongitude] [float]  NULL,
	[PickupLatLong] [nvarchar](4000)  NULL,
	[DropoffLatitude] [float]  NULL,
	[DropoffLongitude] [float]  NULL,
	[DropoffLatLong] [nvarchar](4000)  NULL,
	[PassengerCount] [int]  NULL,
	[TripDurationSeconds] [int]  NULL,
	[TripDistanceMiles] [float]  NULL,
	[PaymentType] [nvarchar](4000)  NULL,
	[FareAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL,
	[SurchargeAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL,
	[TaxAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL,
	[TipAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL,
	[TollsAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL,
	[TotalAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL
)
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = '/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = trainingdatasource,
        FILE_FORMAT = ParquetTrainingFileFormat
    )

    select top 100* from dbo.NYCTaxi

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'NYCTaxiTripSmall' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.NYCTaxiTripSmall
    (
     [DateID] int,
     [MedallionID] int,
     [HackneyLicenseID] int,
     [PickupTimeID] int,
     [DropoffTimeID] int,
     [PickupGeographyID] int,
     [DropoffGeographyID] int,
     [PickupLatitude] float,
     [PickupLongitude] float,
     [PickupLatLong] nvarchar(4000),
     [DropoffLatitude] float,
     [DropoffLongitude] float,
     [DropoffLatLong] nvarchar(4000),
     [PassengerCount] int,
     [TripDurationSeconds] int,
     [TripDistanceMiles] float,
     [PaymentType] nvarchar(4000),
     [FareAmount] numeric(19,4),
     [SurchargeAmount] numeric(19,4),
     [TaxAmount] numeric(19,4),
     [TipAmount] numeric(19,4),
     [TollsAmount] numeric(19,4),
     [TotalAmount] numeric(19,4)
    )
WITH
    (
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
     -- HEAP
    )
GO

COPY INTO dbo.NYCTaxiTripSmall
(DateID 1, MedallionID 2, HackneyLicenseID 3, PickupTimeID 4, DropoffTimeID 5,
PickupGeographyID 6, DropoffGeographyID 7, PickupLatitude 8, PickupLongitude 9, 
PickupLatLong 10, DropoffLatitude 11, DropoffLongitude 12, DropoffLatLong 13, 
PassengerCount 14, TripDurationSeconds 15, TripDistanceMiles 16, PaymentType 17, 
FareAmount 18, SurchargeAmount 19, TaxAmount 20, TipAmount 21, TollsAmount 22, 
TotalAmount 23)
FROM 'https://synapsesadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsetraining/NYCTripSmall.parquet'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
    ,MAXERRORS = 0
    ,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)

Select count(*) from dbo.NYCTaxiTripSmall

SELECT PassengerCount,
      SUM(TripDistanceMiles) as SumTripDistance,
      AVG(TripDistanceMiles) as AvgTripDistance
INTO dbo.PassengerCountStats
FROM  dbo.NYCTaxiTripSmall
WHERE TripDistanceMiles > 0 AND PassengerCount > 0
GROUP BY PassengerCount;
SELECT * FROM dbo.PassengerCountStats
ORDER BY PassengerCount;

Use SynapseTrainingDB
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Hello@123!$%'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL trainingcredential
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE trainingdatasource2 WITH(
LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsetraining@synapsesadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net',
CREDENTIAL = trainingcredential
);

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetTrainingFileFormat
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.NYCTaxi2
( 
	[DateID] [int]  NULL,
	[MedallionID] [int]  NULL,
	[HackneyLicenseID] [int]  NULL,
	[PickupTimeID] [int]  NULL,
	[DropoffTimeID] [int]  NULL,
	[PickupGeographyID] [int]  NULL,
	[DropoffGeographyID] [int]  NULL,
	[PickupLatitude] [float]  NULL,
	[PickupLongitude] [float]  NULL,
	[PickupLatLong] [nvarchar](4000)  NULL,
	[DropoffLatitude] [float]  NULL,
	[DropoffLongitude] [float]  NULL,
	[DropoffLatLong] [nvarchar](4000)  NULL,
	[PassengerCount] [int]  NULL,
	[TripDurationSeconds] [int]  NULL,
	[TripDistanceMiles] [float]  NULL,
	[PaymentType] [nvarchar](4000)  NULL,
	[FareAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL,
	[SurchargeAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL,
	[TaxAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL,
	[TipAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL,
	[TollsAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL,
	[TotalAmount] [numeric](19,4)  NULL
)
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = '/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = trainingdatasource2,
        FILE_FORMAT = ParquetTrainingFileFormat
    )

    
    select top 100* from dbo.NYCTaxi

SELECT
    Department, Sum(Salary) as Total_Salary
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsesadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsetraining/Empdetails.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    group by Department

SELECT
   *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsesadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsetraining/Empdetails.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
)
with
    (
Department nvarchar(30)
    )
    AS [result]
    
    
    -- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 10 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsesadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsetraining/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    with
    (
DateID BIGINT
,MedallionID INT
    )
    AS [result]

source:
import fsspec
import pandas

adls_account_name = 'synapseadlsgen2'
sas_key = TokenLibrary.getConnectionString('AzureDataLakeStorageTraining')
fsspec.open('abfss://synapsetraining/Empdetails.csv',account_name = adls_account_name, sas_token = sas_key)
with fsspec_object.open() as f:
   df5= pandas.read_csv(f)

display(f)

import pandas
import fsspec


df2 = pandas.read_csv('abfss://synapsetraining@synapsesadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/Empdetails.csv',
storage_options = {'accountkey':'vTuXI5wwfw//GEtVYR1FzwNhVPoIrBghdwWoPHqAsYDNNE8AYBdFcw7FjbNt+V+9PsWQfmgMLSJp+ASthuHiPQ=='})
display(df2)
spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS nyctaxi")

%%pyspark
df = spark.sql("""SELECT PassengerCount,
      SUM(TripDistanceMiles) as SumTripDistance,
      AVG(TripDistanceMiles) as AvgTripDistance
FROM  nyctaxi.trip
WHERE TripDistanceMiles > 0 AND PassengerCount > 0
GROUP BY PassengerCount
ORDER BY PassengerCount""")
display(df)
df.write.saveAsTable("nyctaxi.passengercountstats")

%%pyspark
df = spark.sql("Select * from nyctaxi.passengercountstats")
#display(df)
df1 = df.repartition(1)
df1.write.mode("overwrite").csv("/NYCTaxi/csvfile")
df1.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("/NYCTaxi/parquetfile")
